segments.text: This kitchen scene is heartbreaking in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle, unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be lonely for her, not seeing the chaos around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that unstable stool, it worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and get hurt, poor kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, but inside it's falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for this oblivious family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be such a hassle.
segments.speaker: PAR
